txt.en: 'The Nêpharai have begun to build out their settlement in Harkhaphâr. Search the camp and destroy the largest dwellings in an attempt to push them elsewhere in the catacombs.'
Return to Bâkhadir located just north of Harkhaphâr and inform him of your progress.
Talk to Bâkhadir outside of the camp
To the south, the Nêpharai have made a small encampment known as Harkhaphâr. There are several dwellings that have been hastily constructed. Find them and destroy them.
'With the Nêpharai buildings destroyed, perhaps this should encourage them to avoid us and move elsewhere.'
Search Harkhaphâr and destroy the largest dwellings in an attempt to push them elsewhere in the catacombs.
